SobreNosotrosDescripcion: Experience a unique time at Resaca, a party inspired by the most iconic parties of Ibiza. Connect with nature in a sophisticated and exclusive environment, where the music transports you to a world of unique sensations. Forget about conventional dance floors and let yourself be carried away by an avant-garde and immersive musical proposal designed to awaken your senses.
PaginaNoEncontrada: Oops! The page you were looking for does not exist
InformacionCookiesDescripcion: In accordance with Law 34/2002, of July 11, on information society services and electronic commerce (LSSI), in relation to Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council, of April 27, 2016, General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Organic Law 3/2018, of December 5, on the Protection of Personal Data and Guarantee of Digital Rights (LOPDGDD), it is mandatory to obtain the express consent of the user of all web pages that use non-essential cookies, before they browse them.
QueSonCookiesDescripcion: Cookies and other similar technologies such as local shared objects, flash cookies or pixels, are tools used by web servers to store and retrieve information about their visitors, as well as to ensure the proper functioning of the site.
QueSonCookiesDescripcion2: By using these devices, the web server is allowed to remember some data concerning the user, such as their preferences for viewing the pages of that server, username and password, products that interest them most, etc.
CookiesAfectadasNormativa: Cookies Affected by the Regulation and Exempt Cookies
CookiesAfectadasNormativaDescripcion: According to the EU directive, cookies that require informed consent from the user are analytics cookies and advertising and affiliation cookies, excepting technical cookies and those necessary for the functioning of the website or the provision of services expressly requested by the user.
CookiesTecnicasDescripcion: These allow the user to browse through a web page, platform or application and use the different options or services that exist on it.
CookiesAnaliticasDescripcion: They allow the responsible party to track and analyze the behavior of users of the websites to which they are linked. The information collected is used to measure the activity of websites and to create navigation profiles.
CookiesPublicitariasDescripcion: They allow the management of advertising spaces based on criteria such as edited content or the frequency in which ads are displayed.
CookiesPublicidadComportamentalDescripci: They collect information about user preferences to manage advertising spaces effectively.
CookiesSocialesDescripcion: Set by social media platforms to share content and track online activity.
CookiesAfiliadosDescripcion: They allow tracking of visits from other websites with which an affiliation contract is established.
CookiesSeguridadDescripcion: They store encrypted information to protect data from malicious attacks.
CookiesPropiasDescripcion: Sent from a device or domain managed by the publisher itself.
CookiesTercerosDescripcion: Sent from a device or domain managed by another entity.
CookiesSesionDescripcion: They collect and store data while the user accesses a web page.
CookiesPersistentesDescripcion: Data is stored in the terminal for a period defined by the cookie manager.
TratamientoDatosDescripcion: Resaca club is the data controller of the Interested Party's personal data and informs that these data will be processed in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679, of April 27, 2016 (GDPR), providing the following information on processing:
FinesTratamientoDescripcion: As specified in the cookies section used on this website.
LigitimacionTratamientoDescripcion: By consent of the interested party (art. 6.1 GDPR).
CriteriosConservacionDatoDescripcion: As specified in the cookies section used on the web.
ComunicacionDatosDescripcion: Will not be communicated to third parties, except in the case of third-party cookies or by legal obligation.
DerechoRetirarConsentimiento: Right to withdraw consent at any time.
DerechoAcceso: Right of access, rectification, portability, and deletion of your data, and limitation or opposition to its processing.
DerechoReclamacion: Right to file a complaint with the Supervisory Authority (www.aepd.es) if you consider that the processing does not comply with current regulations.
DatosContacto: Contact Information to Exercise Your Rights
PanelConfiguracionDescripcion: From this panel, you can configure the cookies that the website can install in your browser, except for the technical or functional cookies that are necessary for navigation and the use of the different services.
GestionarCookiesTitulo: How to Manage Cookies from the Browser
EliminarCookiesDescripcion: Cookies that are already on a device can be deleted by clearing the browser history.
GestionarCookiesDescripcion: For more precise control of site-specific cookies, adjust your privacy settings in the browser.
BloquearCookiesDescripcion: Most modern browsers allow you to block cookies, which may affect the functioning of some services and features.
EliminarCookiesNavegador: How to Delete Cookies from the Most Common Browsers
UsamosCookies: We use cookies to improve your experience in our website.
Evento13-9: Live an unique experience friday 13 of september from 6:00 pm
ResponsableDatos: Who is responsible for processing your personal data?
ResponsableDatosDescripcion: RESACA CLUB is responsible for processing the personal data of the USER and informs you that this data will be processed in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) 2016/679, of April 27 (GDPR), and Organic Law 3/2018, of December 5 (LOPDGDD).
PorqueDatos: Why do we process your personal data?
PorqueDatosDescripcion: To maintain a commercial relationship with the user. The planned operations to carry out the processing are:
RemisionComunicaciones: Sending commercial advertising communications via email, fax, SMS, MMS, social networks, or any other electronic or physical means, present or future, that enables commercial communications. These communications will be carried out by the RESPONSIBLE entity and will be related to its products and services, or those of its partners or suppliers with whom the RESPONSIBLE entity has reached a promotional agreement. In this case, third parties will never have access to personal data.
RealizarEstudios: Conduct market studies and statistical analysis.
TramitarEncargos: Process requests, respond to inquiries, or any type of request made by the USER through any of the contact forms or sales channels provided on the RESPONSIBLE entity's website.
RemitirBoletin: Send the online newsletter, regarding updates, offers, and promotions in our activity.
MotivoDatos: Why can we process your personal data?
MotivoDatosDescripcion:
Because the processing is legitimized by Article 6 of the GDPR as follows:
With the consent of the USER: sending commercial communications and the newsletter.
For the legitimate interest of the RESPONSIBLE: conducting market studies, statistical analysis, etc., and processing orders, requests, etc., at the USER's request.
TiempoDatos: How long will we keep your personal data?
TiempoDatosDescripcion: Data will be retained for no longer than necessary to maintain the purpose of processing or as long as legal requirements dictate its storage, and when no longer necessary, it will be securely deleted or anonymized.
QuienDatos: To whom do we disclose your personal data?
QuienDatosDescripcion: No communication of personal data to third parties is planned unless necessary for the development and execution of the purposes of the processing, to our service providers related to communications, with whom the RESPONSIBLE entity has signed confidentiality and data processor agreements as required by current privacy regulations.
DerechosDatosDescripcion: The USER has the following rights:
CaracterInformacion: MANDATORY OR OPTIONAL NATURE OF THE INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE USER
CaracterInformacionDescripcion: By ticking the corresponding boxes and entering data in the fields, marked with an asterisk (*) in the contact form or presented in other forms, USERS expressly and freely accept that their data is necessary to handle their request by the provider, with the inclusion of data in the remaining fields being voluntary. The USER guarantees that the personal data provided to the CONTROLLER is truthful and is responsible for communicating any modifications. The CONTROLLER informs that all the data requested through the website is mandatory, as it is necessary to provide an optimal service to the USER. If not all data is provided, it is not guaranteed that the information and services provided will fully meet their needs.
MedidasSeguridadDescripcion:
In accordance with the current regulations on the protection of personal data, the CONTROLLER is complying with all provisions of the GDPR and LOPDGDD regulations for the processing of personal data under its responsibility and explicitly with the principles described in Article 5 of the GDPR, ensuring that they are processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently in relation to the data subject and are adequate, relevant, and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purposes for which they are processed.
The CONTROLLER guarantees that it has implemented appropriate technical and organizational policies to apply the security measures established by the GDPR and LOPDGDD in order to protect the rights and freedoms of USERS and has communicated the appropriate information to allow them to exercise these rights.
For more information about privacy guarantees, you can contact the CONTROLLER via email: info@resacaclub.com.
AceptoComunicaciones: I want to receive information about events or promotions of Resaca Club.
HacerClick: By clicking Get on the list you agree to the terms and conditions of use of the website.
HacerClickContacto: By clicking SEND you agree to the terms and conditions of use of the website.
